location.brewery_address: Upper Spernall Farm, off Spernal Lane, Great Alne

brewery.brewery_description:
Purity Brewing Company is an award winning craft brewery established in 2005.

When we set out the mission was simple: brew great beer without prejudice, with a conscience and with a consistency and an attention to detail, which is second to none.

Based on a working farm in the heart of the beautiful Warwickshire countryside, our brewery practices are designed to be environmentally friendly and in some cases in the case of our wetland system, environmentally enriching.

beer.beer_description: A moreish, unfiltered, gluten free and vegan friendly session IPA, infused with real grapefruit peel and brimming with tropical fruit and hop aromas.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

beer.beer_description:
Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 185 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 38.

items.checkin_comment: A flavour I can taste and a beer to take the edge off my cold. 🤧

beer.beer_description:
Bunny Hop is a hazy pale ale that is vegan friendly and gluten free! Our brew team have increased the percentage of oats to enhance the haziness and introduced dry hopping with El Dorado, Centennial and Azacca. It is brewed with Maris Otter, Lager Malt, Cara Pils and Wheat Malts. 
Bunny Hop is a bold beer, which perfectly balances its low abv of 3.5%, pale malts and powerful hops with an IBU 55.
Bunny Hop is best served with spicy foods, tempura, white meats and white fish.
Perfect dish for Bunny Hop – Spiced grilled chicken with black bean sauced noodles.

items.checkin_comment: Have I got news for you time

beer.beer_description:
Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Pure UBU (pronounced ‘OO-BOO’) is a distinctive, full flavoured beer with a sweeter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Crystal, Black and Wheat malts, with Hallertau Northern Brewer and Cascade hops. Winner of seven awards.

Pure UBU is named after our faithful canine friend ‘UBU’, a maverick, brim full of character and the unofficial protector of our secrets.  God love her, the dog is mad, but an inspiration to all who enjoy doing what they do and who want to be loved for being what they are.

Pure UBU (pronounced ‘OO-BOO’) is a distinctive, full flavoured beer with a sweeter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Crystal, Black and Wheat malts, with Hallertau Northern Brewer and Cascade hops. Winner of seven awards.

Pure UBU is named after our faithful canine friend ‘UBU’, a maverick, brim full of character and the unofficial protector of our secrets.  God love her, the dog is mad, but an inspiration to all who enjoy doing what they do and who want to be loved for being what they are.

Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Cask ABV: 3.8%, Bottle ABV: 4.3%.

Pure Gold is a refreshing golden ale with a dry and bitter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Caragold and Wheat malts, plus Hallertau Northern Brewer, Bobeck and Hereford Goldings hops. Winner of nine awards.
A moreish, unfiltered, gluten free and vegan friendly session IPA, infused with real grapefruit peel and brimming with tropical fruit and hop aromas.

items.badge_description: Keep the party rolling all day long with your favorite low ABV session IPAs. That's 95 different beers with style of IPA - Session. Try 5 more for Level 20!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 325 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 66!

beer.beer_description:
JIMBO – The Very Best Bitter. Brewed to celebrate the life of our co-founder James Minkin who sadly passed away in summer 2020. Showcasing the very best in British and local ingredients, JIMBO is a classic British Best Bitter that has a recognisable Purity character and balance of flavour.

Using only finest hops from our long-standing friends at Charles Faram. JIMBO is brewed with Pilgrim for that initial bitterness alongside the classics Fuggles, Goldings and a brand-new hop Emperor – part of the Charles Faram hop breeding programme. The combination of classic and new wave hops give JIMBO aromas of mixed berries, crisp apple, yet all balanced with a well-rounded nutty bitter finish. JIMBO is also vegan and gluten-free.

As part of Purity’s commitment to the local community and a further way of continuing Jim’s legacy the brewery is donating 5p for every can sold to the Pancreatic Cancer Research Fund (PCRF).

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 35 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 6!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 35 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 8!

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

Pure UBU (pronounced ‘OO-BOO’) is a distinctive, full flavoured beer with a sweeter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Crystal, Black and Wheat malts, with Hallertau Northern Brewer and Cascade hops. Winner of seven awards.

Pure UBU is named after our faithful canine friend ‘UBU’, a maverick, brim full of character and the unofficial protector of our secrets.  God love her, the dog is mad, but an inspiration to all who enjoy doing what they do and who want to be loved for being what they are.

Longhorn IPA as in expertly brewed craft ale named after the herd of Longhorn Cattle that feed of Purity’s spent grains. We use only the finest natural ingredients to create and American style IPA that is full of character and which leaves you wanting more. Brewed with Maris Otter, Rye, Crystal Rye and Caramalt to create a copper warming colour and hopped with Pilgrim, Chinook, Galaxy and Simcoe hops, Longhorn has both citrus and tropical fruit tones.

Cask ABV: 3.8%, Bottle ABV: 4.3%.

Pure Gold is a refreshing golden ale with a dry and bitter finish. Brewed with English Maris Otter, Caragold and Wheat malts, plus Hallertau Northern Brewer, Bobeck and Hereford Goldings hops. Winner of nine awards.

Bunny Hop is a hazy pale ale that is vegan friendly and gluten free! Our brew team have increased the percentage of oats to enhance the haziness and introduced dry hopping with El Dorado, Centennial and Azacca. It is brewed with Maris Otter, Lager Malt, Cara Pils and Wheat Malts. 
Bunny Hop is a bold beer, which perfectly balances its low abv of 3.5%, pale malts and powerful hops with an IBU 55.
Bunny Hop is best served with spicy foods, tempura, white meats and white fish.
Perfect dish for Bunny Hop – Spiced grilled chicken with black bean sauced noodles.

Lawless Lager, our maverick brew follows the 500- year-old Bavarian brewing law to achieve traditional purity using only four ingredients. We then added an idiosyncratic twist of our own, creating a blend of Hallertau Northern Brewer, Eldorado and Styrian Goldings hops. With Pilsner Malt, Wheat Malt, Caragold, lager yeast and our own mineral rich local water. Coolly lagered for 40 days – oh, and we slipped in a dash of hops, whilst no one was looking – for a sharp, citrusy kick.
A moreish, unfiltered, gluten free and vegan friendly session IPA, infused with real grapefruit peel and brimming with tropical fruit and hop aromas.

Everything is better doubled! When we first saw the family of rabbits at the end of our lane double in size it gave Aaron in the brew team a great idea. Firing up the pilot kit with the same malt & hop bill as our Hazy Pale Bunny Hop, he doubled the quantities to deliver all the best juicy, characteristics of Bunny Hop yet with a higher ABV.

Our new DIPA is 6.8% ABV and has been brewed using El Dorado, Centennial and Azacca hops. It’s juicy, balanced and has stone fruit and citrusy aromas.

We think it’s perfect for these long sunny evenings, BBQ’s and pairs deliciously with buffalo cauli wings.

Following the Reinheitsgebot Purity laws of 1516, Pure Helles uses the finest English organic malt and  hops with a blend of classic organic noble hops of the highest quality from Bavaria that give Pure Helles a clean, refreshing and bright appearance but with that unmistakable Purity character. Vegan-friendly and gluten-free.

JIMBO – The Very Best Bitter. Brewed to celebrate the life of our co-founder James Minkin who sadly passed away in summer 2020. Showcasing the very best in British and local ingredients, JIMBO is a classic British Best Bitter that has a recognisable Purity character and balance of flavour.

Using only finest hops from our long-standing friends at Charles Faram. JIMBO is brewed with Pilgrim for that initial bitterness alongside the classics Fuggles, Goldings and a brand-new hop Emperor – part of the Charles Faram hop breeding programme. The combination of classic and new wave hops give JIMBO aromas of mixed berries, crisp apple, yet all balanced with a well-rounded nutty bitter finish. JIMBO is also vegan and gluten-free.

As part of Purity’s commitment to the local community and a further way of continuing Jim’s legacy the brewery is donating 5p for every can sold to the Pancreatic Cancer Research Fund (PCRF).

beer.beer_name: Purity Pale (Official Ale of Aston Villa FC)
beer.beer_description: Created exclusively for Villa Park. Purity Pale is a zesty pale ale with a refreshing citrus finish.
A British Pilsner made from locally sourced British hops..Pilgrim,Challenger,Goldings and Jester.
Pure Stout is brewed to deliver perfectly balanced notes of dried fruit and chocolate, whilst being charged with nitrogen to enhance the creamy head, aromas and mouthfeel.

We have collaboratively crafted what we think is the perfect Pure Cider: A blend of apple varieties to produce a medium dry cider at 4.6%, naturally crafted from a wild fermentation and filter process producing a clean crisp session cider.

Introducing Purity’s first ever low alcohol brew Point Five, Every-Day Pale!
Our new brew is full flavoured, vegan, organic and gluten free, with only 0.5% alcohol.
Rather than rush things, we’ve taken our time to develop and  create a Pure Quality brew that is low in alcohol but full in flavour. Unlike other ‘no & lo’ brews Point Five doesn’t use any lactose so it’s vegan friendly yet doesn’t lose any mouthfeel or body.  Point Five is certified as organic by the Soil Association, heavily hopped with Nelson Sauvin, Mosaic, Citra & Wakatu to deliver incredible citrus notes of grapefruit & lime.
Ideally matched with sunshine, live music or whenever you’d normally enjoy a beer!
Store cold, serve chilled and enjoy fresh.

Crafted in partnership with English Heritage. 

A bright straw-coloured lager, characterised by its underlying malt sweetness, sublime refinement and refreshment alongside that unmistakable Purity character. 

Certified organic by the Soil Association and brewed to an entirely organic malted barley and hops recipe.
Gluten free

Our latest innovation in beer; we've taken our hybrid coffee stout and aged it for 6 months in Beaufort Spirit Oak Smoked Rum barrels.

This exceptional, aged Imperial Stout will compliment the chocolate and coffee notes of Fixie with coconut, sweet rum and smoky molasses.
Brewed in partnership with English Heritage.

Crafted in partnership with English Heritage.
Low in alcohol, but full in flavour our English Heritage Everyday Pale is copper orange in appearance with a sweet malt backbone. Hopped & dry hopped delivering incredible citrus notes of grapefruit & lime.
Unfiltered lager, sweet and malty
